rules_text:
Faceless Worshipper can't block.
[i]Penance[/i] – {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice Faceless Worshipper: Put a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: [i]“When he told me that he was being haunted by his inner demons, I had no idea he meant it so... literally.”[/i]
